column1: Smoque BBQ////Best BBQ I've had in Chicago. Blows Honey One
column3: and Fat Willy's out of the water. There's usually a huge line
column5: but don't let this discourage you
column6: I've never waited more than 30 minutes for a seat. The food would be worth a wait twice as long
column8: the ribs are fantastic and all the sides I've tried have been fantastic. The guys that run this are unpretentious and seem to have figured out a way to make juicy and flavorful meat. I only wish this type of food was healthier so I could go more often.
